articles.title: Spectacular images of deep space captured by NASA's James Webb space telescope - DNA India
articles.description: Situated within the Galactic bulge, NGC 6440 is a globular cluster situated 28,000 light years from Earth. Globular clusters, which contain hundreds of thousands to millions of older stars, are strongly gravitationally bound to one another.
